query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM DDEPhase p
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM DDEPhase p WHERE p.description = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM DDEStatus s
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM DDEStatus s WHERE s.description = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompCatalog c WHERE c.statusId > 0 AND c.currentVersion = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompCatalog c WHERE c.statusId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompCatalog c WHERE c.rootCategory = ?1 AND c.statusId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompCatalog c WHERE c.publicInd = 1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompVersions c WHERE c.compCatalog.id = ?1 AND c.version = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompVersions c WHERE c.compCatalog.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompVersionDates c WHERE c.componentVersionId = ?1 and c.phaseId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompKeywords c WHERE c.compCatalog.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompExamples c WHERE c.compVersions.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompDownload c WHERE c.compVersions.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(d) FROM DDELicenseLevel d
SELECT OBJECT(d) FROM DDELicenseLevel d WHERE d.statusId > 0
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompDependencies c WHERE c.compVersions.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompDependencies c WHERE c.childCompVersions.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompDependencies c WHERE c.compVersions.id = ?1 AND c.childCompVersions.id = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM DDETechnologyTypes t WHERE t.statusId > 0
SELECT OBJECT(d) FROM DDEDocTypes d WHERE d.statusId > 0
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompTechnology c WHERE c.compVersions.id = ?1 AND c.technologyTypes.statusId > 0
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompTechnology c WHERE c.technologyTypes.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompTechnology c WHERE c.compVersions.id = ?1 AND c.technologyTypes.id = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompDocumentation c WHERE c.compVersions.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECategories c WHERE c.statusId > 0
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECategories c WHERE c.statusId > 0 AND c.parentCategoryId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompCategories c WHERE c.compCatalog.id = ?1 AND c.compCatalog.statusId > 0
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompCategories c WHERE c.categories.id = ?1 AND c.compCatalog.statusId > 0
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompCategories c WHERE c.compCatalog.id = ?1 AND c.categories.id = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompForumXref c WHERE c.compVersions.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompForumXref c WHERE c.categoryId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompForumXref c WHERE c.compVersions.id = ?1 AND c.categoryId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM DDERoles r WHERE r.statusId > 0
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM DDEPriceTiers p
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDECompReviews c WHERE c.compVersions.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM DDEUserRole r WHERE r.compVersions.id = ?1 AND r.roles.statusId > 0
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM DDEUserRole r WHERE r.roles.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM DDEUserRole r WHERE r.userMaster.id = ?1
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT dt.compVersions.compCatalog.id) FROM DDEDownloadTracking dt WHERE dt.userMaster.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM DDEUserTechnologies t WHERE t.userMaster.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDEUserCustomer c WHERE c.userMaster.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM DDEUserCustomer c WHERE c.activationCode = ?1
